title: Chicago Sues Sessions Over Sanctuary City Funding (Audio)
itunes:title: Chicago Sues Sessions Over Sanctuary City Funding (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Rick Su, a professor at the University at Buffalo School of Law, discusses a lawsuit filed by Chicago mayor Rahm Emanuel against the U.S. Department of Justice for attempting to block funding to sanctuary cities like Chicago. He speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
